title: Marine scientist uses genetics to inform conservation (Northeastern University)
text: ( Source : Northeastern University ) New assistant professor Kathleen Lotterhos of Northeastern 's Marine Science Center uncovers clues to environmental sustainability by using genetic analyses to study species from pine trees to Pacific
